metadata.hypothesis_statement: Major League Cricket is preparing procurement related to UI/UX Design Project
metadata.justification: The content contains an explicit, active RFP for a Digital Transformation Project from American Cricket Enterprises (Major League Cricket) with a specific submission deadline of October 10, 2025, meeting the criteria for a strong procurement signal.

evidence.content: American Cricket Enterprises has issued an RFP for a Digital Transformation Project...Proposals due on 10 October, 2025.

metadata.hypothesis_statement: Major League Cricket is preparing procurement related to Python Data Processing Project
metadata.justification: The content contains an active RFP for a Digital Transformation Project that mentions data integration and processing as part of the scope, but lacks specific details about Python data processing projects. The procurement signal is present but not specific to the hypothesis.

evidence.content: This solution will improve the fan experience, optimize commercial opportunities and integrate with existing and new systems for ticketing, merchandise, email marketing, and more whilst also maintaining compliance with relevant data protection and privacy laws.
